paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted pathogenic variants in the BRCA2 gene from a study on pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma patients.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Two of them (BRCA2 c.7977-1G>T; SPINK1 c.194 + 2T>C) are listed in the ClinVar database.

functional_data.summary: The variant is reported to be pathogenic.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on ClinVar listing
variants.additional_notes: This variant has been consistently reported to be pathogenic.
key_quotes: The BRCA2 variant was consistently reported to be pathogenic.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in BRCA2 was reported in the paper.
